sourcesContent: Id Nombre Laboratorio Fecha de Fabricacion Fecha de Vencimiento Stock Valor Unitario {{inventario.nombre}} {{inventario.nombre}} {{inventario.stock}} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { InventarioService } from './inventario.service'; import { Inventario } from './inventario'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inventario', templateUrl: './inventario.component.html', // styleUrls: ['./inventario.component.css'] styles: [` :host ::ng-deep .p-datatable .p-datatable-thead > tr > th { position: -webkit-sticky; position: sticky; top: 5rem; } .layout-news-active :host ::ng-deep .p-datatable tr > th { top: 7rem; } `] }) export class InventarioComponent { inventarios: Inventario[]; constructor(private inverntarioService : InventarioService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getInventerio(); } getInventerio(){ this.inverntarioService.getInventerio().then( this.inventario => this.inventario = this.inventarios } ) } }
